DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY ; FILM : 5 ACTORS , DIRECTORS TO BE HONORED AT FESTIVAL
DOC.TEXT: The 1994 American Film Institute ' s International Film Festival opens today in Santa Monica at Laemmle ' s Monica Theatres . The festival , which runs_through July 7 , will coincide with the World Cup USA ' s cultural showcase , Arts94.Five actors and directors will be honored in nightly tributes that will include a showing of the artist ' s works and a question and answer session with the honoree . On Saturday , the institute will honor Dennis Hopper , a writer , director and actor who starred in " Easy Rider " and " Blue Velvet. " In his question and answer period , he will be joined by actor Sean Penn . Academy Award winner Holly Hunter will be_on hand Sunday for a tribute session moderated by Jean Firstenberg , director of the institute . The festival is open_to the public with movie showings from 1:20 to 9 p.m. at the Laemmle Theatres , 1332 2nd St. , Santa Monica . Admission for all movies and tributes is $ 7.50. Information : Theatix , ( 213 ) 466-1767 .
